posts.post_content: Im not against Auras as much as most people are, but you would have to put at least 2 Auras on it to make it worth this card, and since it doesn't have hexproof it would be so easy to just kill it and get rid of all of these cards. Uril, the miststalker on the other hand has hexproof and is a 5/5 to start with so there's no comparison.

Posted By: Sutebe (8/17/2011 4:14:23 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
Different color, but this guy has pretty much been rendered obsolete by [Kor Spiritdancer](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Kor Spiritdancer). It's like someone stuck the Wombat in a blender with [Verduran Enchantress](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Verduran Enchantress), added some bleach and made it "lite".  
  
Rabid Wombat decks were always interesting to see played back in the day. They rarely won, but when they did... damn.
